ROOT.StateField: CASE WHEN ZXJS IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN ZXKS IS NULL THEN '待执行' ELSE '执行中' END ELSE '已完结' END as state
ROOT.GetCzpList: SELECT T.CZPID AS TICKETID,T.CZPBH AS SERIAL,T.YFSJ AS PLANTIME,T.CZMD AS ABSTRACT, '' as CREATERUSER,'' AS JXP,same:StateField FROM PI6000.SG_UD_CZP_CZP_JSSD T
ROOT.GetCzpListDzx: same:GetCzpList WHERE T.ZXKS IS NULL AND T.CZMD LIKE '%{0}%' ORDER BY T.CZMD
ROOT.GetCzpListMl: same:GetCzpList WHERE T.CZMD LIKE '%{0}%' AND T.YFSJ>={1} AND T.YFSJ<{2} ORDER BY T.CZMD
ROOT.GetCzpListZxz: same:GetCzpList WHERE T.CZMD LIKE '%{0}%' AND T.ZXKS IS NOT NULL AND T.ZXJS IS NULL ORDER BY T.CZMD
ROOT.GetCzpListYzx: same:GetCzpList WHERE T.CZMD LIKE '%{0}%' AND T.ZXKS<{2} AND T.ZXJS>{1} ORDER BY T.CZMD
ROOT.GetCzp: SELECT T.CZPID AS TICKETID,T.CZPBH AS SERIAL,'' as CREATERUSER,T.CZMD AS ABSTRACT, '' AS RATIFYUSER,'' AS CREATETIME,'' AS PLANTIME FROM PI6000.SG_UD_CZP_CZP_JSSD T WHERE T.CZPID={0}
ROOT.GetCzpCmd: SELECT c.CZDW AS STANAME,c.XH ASCMDINDEX,c.CZNR AS SENTENCE,c.SLR AS SENDUSER ,c.JSR AS RECVUSER ,'' AS RETURNUSER,c.CZSJ AS REALTIME,'' AS RETURNTIME,SBID FROM PI6000.SG_UD_CZP_CZL_JSSD c WHERE c.CZPID={0}
